data.message: That is incredible, what a engineering wonder. Great job to all involved in the project.

replies.message: Thank you for your support, Mike! -Brad

David Cedrone i am not FB but i see why you said something. lol I don't think they care about landing yet but someday they might. The basic ideal behind it is to keep it in the air forever, in essence.
That's great a fantastic!  Amazing Project! Thanks your 🙏 Congratulations!

So wonderful. Thank you Facebook - Brad for all the great things y'all do, especially the trending section. Y'all always select positive topics and never have anything negative. It's such a joy to see such great topics and celebrity topics for days at a time. Keep up your great work and look forward to the great topics coming up this week. PCPOS.
Tony Hardy thanks I'd just think spending all that money perhaps it at least has a parachute to land it
Wonder! It is. What every human kind would Think as magic  is real. Keep moving forward FB and good luck to more in the coming futur.
